website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, these easy-to-wash bags are suitable for consumers who prefer soft fabric materials over silicone or vinyl.
pros: Made of strong polyurethane laminate fabric that can be wiped clean or placed on the top rack of the dishwasher
Have built-in liners for added durability
Choice of several cute graphics that are appealing to kids
cons: Have a strange odor that tends to fade with use
Zippers are prone to jamming and breaking
The downside of the fabric material is that it has the tendency do retain moisture

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these daily for lunches for the lat few weeks, they clean nicely and dry fast (I hand wash) I had a tuna sandwich one say and after washing it in the dish water, there was NO SMELL. Have not stained from Cheeto's in my son's lunch either. Fresh rinsed grapes did not leak. Kids think he has a "cool mom" Cause he has cool baggies. I feel better not putting plastic in the landfill from regular baggies. and no losing the lids to the sandwich containers! Highly recommend. Will update after we've used them for a few months as to durability....
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: These lunch bags are super cute. My kid loves the galaxy design. I put them all through the washer before use and they came out great. The fabric is sturdy and looks like it will last a long time. I would definitely recommend them and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Stinky plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses because the description said “eco-friendly” and I was in a hurry and didn’t read the fine print. They’re made from polyurethane and absolutely reek of chemicals right out of the bag. My purpose was to find something biodegradable to replace sandwich bags, not just another piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: blahblahblah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to substitute plastic lunch bags
customer_reviews.text: So I bought those to put snacks for my kid to school. I think it’s a great option instead of wasting plastic bags and polluting the environment. These bag are perfect size, easy to clean, seem durable so far (used it for a week). I love them
customer_reviews.author: Martlet

customer_reviews.title: Joy in my heart!
customer_reviews.text: I hae having to waste things and this is a blessing for ziplock replacements. I will be using these in my upcoming trip and always (because I love snacks and I get hangery easily through out travel much less a normal day). I can tell the material is made well and easy to clean. The sizes are great! Not 100% what I will put in the big one but I love the size options. It's big enough to fit a fat sandwich and have some room left over. The other two sizes are perfect for trail mix and of course Gold Fish!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaRose

customer_reviews.title: Gets moldy and it's not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to put my baby's food pouches in case they spilled well when they did spill the bag leaked through and ruined my diaper bag. When I went to wash them they stain wouldnt come off and it was full of mold.
customer_reviews.author: Rubilatina

customer_reviews.title: Not for wet food or crumbs
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable in person. I actually bought them because I've been sticking my reusable face masks in a ziploc bag in my backpack and wanted to create less waste, and ALSO be able to throw the bags in the washing machine. But the problem I have would be the same problem with using these for snacks. The zipper leaves a gap at the end for stuff to escape. I can't imagine using this for any snack with moisture or crumbs, and I'm not sure it's a good idea to put my dirty face masks in them. I don't know, they're so cute I want to keep them, but I might not be able to use them for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amaryllis Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: Outside material takes 2 days to dry!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are not necessarily difficult to clean, but they do take 2 days to dry the outside! Honestly, I don’t want to have bags drying on my counter for two days. I am so disappointed in these bags and will have to continue my search for a reusable bag that is as easy to use as disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Steffen Braaksma

customer_reviews.title: Odd shapes
customer_reviews.text: These came in odd shapes. There's a big one, a long skinny one that zips at the top (this one's the weird one), and a short wide one. I like them, though not being able to see into them makes it easy to forget what's in your fridge. Before using them, I ran these through the dishwasher and then rinsed out any excess soap before drying them. For future uses, I'll probably just wipe them out unless they get very dirty.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Reusable Bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so convenient, and a nice size for throwing snacks in the diaper bag. I like to use the biggest one for putting pump parts in the fridge rather than having to wash them each time. They are well made and I love the compact size! The cactus design is so cute. Have only been using about a week, but so far so rips or snags, and very easy to clean. Glad to use these instead of plastic baggies since they are reusable!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pouches. They come in a variety of sizes, they're easy to clean, and they have a nice zipper on them, as well. The only thing that I wish were different is probably something that is a problem with all reusable pouches: food gets stale faster in them. Overall though, good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M E

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the space pattern
customer_reviews.text: Overall great for all foods - some foods tend to ooze out through the bag - such as a fruit juice or something of grapes etc but overall I'd purchase again and definitely recommend them - since we've been in quarantine and not using them due to school closure they came in handy for holding items sent home with work from school - crayons, glue sticks, etc so I can just grab the whole bag vs dig for things. IDk about warmth - so I gave it a 3 because I use them for cold or dry items.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Rissala

customer_reviews.title: Mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little snack baggies! More spaced then anticipated which I personally appreciate because I am able to now use these bags for my cloth diapers, liners, utensils, bathroom needs, and of course snack! Plus my husband of Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics degrees got a kick out of the design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch for Mold!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for less than one week and one of the bags is growing mold. After use, we wipe them down and hang them to dry. I am not even sure how the mold began. I will be trying brand for my daughters’ Lunch. ********* UPDATE: The seller was very accommodating and took a personal approach to resolving this issue. They sent new bags with a single lining and they are working well. I wash them everyday and no mold! The updated design helped to keep the moisture out.
customer_reviews.author: KaneT

customer_reviews.title: Great for the diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I hate carrying around plastic bags/bulky containers for my children's snacks and these really help! They're so slim yet can hold a lot. I also love how durable and easy to clean they are; makes it easy to swap out snacks and go. I enjoy the different sizes in this set because it allows me a variety of snack options without squeezing everything in. I would definitely reccomend and will be getting more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Love the double lining
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of different brands of sandwich bags and I really like the way these bags were made. They are double lined, so it feels sturdy and durable. It's also easy to clean - I have been sticking them in the laundry machine, although I think you could also wash them in the dishwasher. The large size sandwich bag is very big and can fit large sized bread pieces. I've used the smaller sizes for carrying pretzels, carrot sticks and cherry tomatoes so far.
customer_reviews.author: NC Mom

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this purchase. Green New Year.
customer_reviews.text: Leak proof? It’s a cloth bag. I hope nobody is trying to put soup in it. Works great for veggies, fruit, crackers, sandwiches, and I have put frozen nuggets and burritos inside. It has survived 6 washes and I love them! No more plastic sandwich bags and everyone knows my stuff is my stuff because of the unique print. Durable. Machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: R Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing plastic waste
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I was looking into reducing my use of plastic ziplocks for my son's snacks. They are easy to clean and come in 3 different sizes which is great. I think my only complaint is that they don't keep foods, such as chips fresh. They sort of get stale if you keep it in there for longer than a day or so. But overall they reduce my plastic waste so thats great.
customer_reviews.author: since79

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Break, stain easily..... They smell so bad hard to get odor out
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute bags. They don’t leak, the construction is really good with quality zippers and sturdy seams, and the fabrics are very cute. Turning them inside out and washing on the top rack of the dishwasher gets them clean, but I prefer throwing them in with a load of laundry after rinsing them or shaking out any crumbs. We use for sandwiches, cut fruit and veggies, little Debbie type dessert cakes, and things like that.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality, very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, great value for the price. They have eliminated the need for plastic bags in my son’s lunch box. Easy to clean. I really like having different sizes, but the only reason I gave four stars instead of five is that there’s not a size that’s particularly suited to standard sandwiches. Middle size works but with extra room.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love the zipper!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a couple of different kinds of food bags, trying to ditch more plastic in my household, but these are far and away the best of the lot. They do a great job of keeping food fresh in lunchboxes, although longer-term storage of things like bread is not optimum. I am going to order another set so I don't have to wash them as often!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These bags work great for dry snacks/foods. We have not tried anything that could possibly leak yet. I do not recommend washing machine because if you use a detergent that is fragrant, the foods can absorb the fragrances! Washing them in the sick and rinsing well is perfect. Turn inside out to dry. They dry pretty quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Travel must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Perfect sizes! I used them to travel with for the first use. One kept the bottle nipples and baby spoons. Another kept my pumping parts, and we took the extra one with snacks! I will be buying again!! Great product! Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Kstuddard

customer_reviews.title: perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: we travelled over the holiday to san diego, and these bags were perfect for snacks. We put oranges in one of them and it wasn't fully leak proof, but it worked out They were super easy to clean, just flip them out and over and hang to dry
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags but they are not leak proof. They wash easily and seem to be durable. Zipper slide easily which is not something I've found on other bags I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: ponygirl67

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love using these for my work lunches. The fabric on the inside can get stained from things like strawberries and blueberries, but I kind of expected that. I run them through the dishwasher to clean them which is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Trent Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Must buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I got the stars and I have to say, wish I could have started using these when I was in school years back. Makes preparing lunch fun. I might have made my lunch more often. Very durable and I don't lose it in my purse. I'd put ziplock bags of snacks or cough drops in my purse and I couldn't find the bag in my messy purse. Now I can find it easier. I like that I can put them in the washer or dishwasher. Haven't tried the dishwasher because I feel the washer would do a better job. Originally got to use for the kids, but I think I'll use it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Shuldt

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: bags are double lined, so they are more durable than other styles. The 3 pack of sizes are great for different snacks, from munchies to sandwiches. Also love the gender neutral print options.. the cactus print is so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Z

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My kids love taking sack lunches to school. We used so many ziplock bags that I sought out something that would save us some money. These are perfect! I love that they're washable and the kids love the print on them. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I should have read the description better, but these things are pretty water resistant. I haven’t tried to hold actual liquid in it but I can say most things probably won’t leak through. I use them for medicine bags as well as little snacks to eat throughout the day. Cute design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bags for packing lunches
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! The only thing I'm not a fan of is that it takes about two days for them to dry (we hand wash them). We have enough bags though that we rotate them during the week so it's not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: trulytree

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my lunch for work. The bags are strong and durable. It washes well in the dishwasher, and dries overnight. I am never using another plastic bag. This will save me from having to use any more sandwich and snack bags, which will be much better for Mother Nature.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great snack bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my daycare kids! Their snacks dont go stale and I dont have to worry about plastic bags all over the place! Absolutely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: keara estrada

customer_reviews.title: Cute storage bags for snacks or toys
customer_reviews.text: These snack bags have been a great add to the diaperbag. They have kept sandwiches and dry snacks like crackers fresh and are easy to clean in the dishwasher (prior to first use and occasionally) but I normally clean them by hand. They have also helped organize small toys and game pieces. The bright design is more recognizeable than the disposable zipper bags and have grabbed the kids attention while picking up the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute design. Easy to clean, for the most part. Bags stain easy from strawberry and blueberry juices, but zip nicely. There are different sizes too for say a small bag of loose veggies or if you want to put a sandwich in the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey LeBrun

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These reusable lunch bags are AMAZING! They’re incredible quality and they wash in the washing machine so well. You can tell how durable they are just by feeling the fabric. We’ve been using them for over 6 months and they’re still perfect. We use them almost daily for lunches and anything we need to be in a baggy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleena

customer_reviews.title: Fine..
customer_reviews.text: These are fine.. in theory.. its very hard to get sandwiches in and out. And the ones it its well into, is huge. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Heather chua

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose beyond snacking
customer_reviews.text: Love the multi sizes, we use them for dry snack and sandwiches, cloth diaper wipes, first aid kits, cosmetic bags, hair accessories, and lots of other nic nacks. Great for keeping little things together and useful for more than snack. 4 stars for easy to clean bc of my test sandwich (pb and j) was a bit of a mess to get out of the inside seams. Otherwise hold up and just flip inside out and toss in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Gray

customer_reviews.title: No more messy lunchbox
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for her school lunch. She was having trouble zipping the Ziplock bags and her leftover snack was all over her lunchbox. Now she has a bag she can easily zip close. I just throw them in the laundry to wash and hang to dry! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of one

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is super cute and these are super easy to clean! The sandwich bag is too big for a sandwich but besides that I’m really happy with these. They don’t leak at all either
customer_reviews.author: Maryjane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Who needs zip lock bags when you can use these durable pouches they are washable and you can use it for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these more than I do. I appreciate they they are thicker than the other reusable bags I have bought in the past, but this also makes the drying time on these forever ( like seriously a long time ). On the plus, they hold snacks well, don't leak, are adorable and eco friendly.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean, good sized and no-snag zippers. Slight warning, although it says leakproof pure liquid pr juicy items may cause some seepage (there was a pickle accident ;-) ). They toss in the washer and are good to go with no staining but just something to note. Overall, extremely satisfied. 9/10!
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Schoudt

customer_reviews.title: Great material and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: The lining inside is great, easily washable and I have yet to stain them. I have used them for both dry and wet products such as meats and veggies w/out any problems! I have not put any actual fluids so I can't comment on that. I bought these and a different kind at this time time however and I love the material these ones are made out of compared to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Great snack bags!
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are really nice. They come in 3 different sizes, and are super cute. The zippers work perfectly and they are well made. My little guy loves them for munching his snack out of, and I love that they are reusable.
customer_reviews.author: lovedbeyondmeasure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go snacks
customer_reviews.text: I like having reusable snack and sandwich bags rather than tossing disposable ones all the time. Between the three sizes of bags, my daily food needs are met. Only thing is they can take a while to dry after being in the dishwasher (keep in mind that my dishwasher itself isn't the best dryer).
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Taber

customer_reviews.title: Love these reusable bags!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeling guilty about single use plastics for a long time, but didn't do anything about it. Feel so much better about using these instead. The middle sized one gets lots of use, the other two less so far, but that may change over time. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Dolberg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't air-dry quickly
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really cute and seem well-made and sturdy. Unfortunately, after washing inside-out on the top-rack of the dishwasher and left to air-dry upside-down on the counter, the bags are still damp after 36+ hours. We prefer reusable bags that will air-dry completely when left overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Harrell Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for lunches and snacks!!! Love the design also! Well made!
customer_reviews.author: al moore

customer_reviews.title: Good bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these daily for the school year for my kindergartener. They have held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I opened these up and they were not at all what I was hoping for. They aren't plastic or anything like that. They seem more like cloth which I hate! It feels like I shouldn't be putting food in them so I never use them. Not a win for me
customer_reviews.author: The Lovelace’s

customer_reviews.title: Reusable lunch bags
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these bags. They're super easy to clean and I haven't had any issues with tearing or discoloration of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Cute design.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. They seem like they will hold up a long time as well! I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Cute prints and good price. The corners leak when hand washing but they are still “leak proof” enough to carry what you would normally put in a plastic sandwich bag. I made the mistake of putting a drop off dish soap in each one when handwashing and had a hard time rinsing the soap out all the way. I think I will try machine wash these with my dish towels and see how that works. Overall they are a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jandt

customer_reviews.title: My sister loves these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister, and she likes them so much she's going to buy another set. She packs her kid's snacks and lunch in them and apparently they are working out great. She's happy to be cutting back on the ziplocks....the image of them building up in the landfill was preying on her.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and great for my kid’s school snacks, car snacks, even mine I take to work. Variety of sizes is good, but would also like a multiple pack of the small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, convenient
customer_reviews.text: I hate throwing plastic bags away, and this makes me feel better about the waste! These are super cute, and convenient. I love the different sizes. They are very durable and all they need are a quick hand wash in the sink with soap!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good for me!
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for snacks when my son bought lunch at school I would send his snack in these. He's five he likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to purchase reusable bags for some time, but did not know which to purchase. This set comes with 3 different sizes. The price is reasonable, and the product is great. Bags do not leak. Zippers work easily. The print is cute!
customer_reviews.author: PeoriaMomOfSeven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby/toddler bag!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are perfect for snacks, baby toys, wipes, anything you can think of for my diaper bag. Love the designs on them. They seem very durable compared to other brands I’ve tried. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Boymom3

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: i got some cheaper better ones at target around back to school time. these are a little too clothy if that makes sense. they retain moisture more than others ive had, should be lined with plastic more.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Used Too much plastic to ship
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the amount of plastic used to ship these, but overall they seem like great little bags. My kids love the patterns
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Langsprit storage bag set is great
customer_reviews.text: Although I just got them and cannot comment on long-term wear, they are so cute, well-made, and perfect to give as a gift to my environmentally conscious college granddaughter. I look forward to using the second set myself in place of baggies for small item storage in my fridge or pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Cristeen Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good little bags.
customer_reviews.text: I love these, so do my kids. We are trying to stop with plastic bags. They are super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is adorable. I wash them is the washing machine. Unlike plastic bags they do allow "air" in so food can become stale. Overall I like and use then daily
customer_reviews.author: amy smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: Reusable bags with cute designs! We make the kids lunches the night before so sometimes food like crackers may get a little stale. But no complaints from the kids.
customer_reviews.author: marsha hall

customer_reviews.title: snack bags instead of zip lock bags
customer_reviews.text: As an effort to reduce my waste and single use items, I bought this bags. I have used them to store dry snacks when we are on the go. I like the print.
customer_reviews.author: S. V. S

customer_reviews.title: Wish my puppy hadn't chewed up one of them
customer_reviews.text: These work great for holding sandwiches, crackers, veggies, and other lunch elements. Too bad my dog liked them too!
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to get kids to eat
customer_reviews.text: The snack bags seem to be pretty durable. They are nice material and so far the zipper has been used hundreds of times (no joke) by our lil one and no problems. Our oldest(8) is excited to take these to school instead of plastic ziplocks. We used one this morning for our youngest breakfast cereal (no milk) and he actually ate. Granted he ran around with the bag but didn’t make a mess!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and leak proof!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that they're reusable to help cut down on our use of plastic zip-lock bags. We just throw them in the top rack of the dishwasher and they're good as new. Would highly recommend as they work perfectly in lunches or a quick picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Help avoid plastic waste in style
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandkids. My daughter uses them often to reduce plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: claudiaing

customer_reviews.title: Endless Uses!
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are durable and the uses are endless! The largest one could even be used to store an extra set of clothes for a small child. They are easy to clean with just soap and water or even just tossing in the wash! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These came fast. Were less expensive than similar ones. Feel durable. Easy to clean. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and pack dry snacks
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy these for my dry snacks. Super easy to clean with soap and warm water. Don’t leave food in for more than a day or two because they will naturally go stale. Also, found out that colored crackers/chips stain the white fabric at the zipper/edges.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Chance

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a fair smell
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Bumkins, these leave a weird smell after washing
customer_reviews.author: Isabela Lessa

customer_reviews.title: Reusable Sandwhich Bags
customer_reviews.text: Love the fun prints! Zippers are very durable as is the material. Easy to hand wash or top rack dishwasher (no heat cycle).
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good first buy for newbie
customer_reviews.text: Just right sized, arrived in great condition, may not but more because zippers are different than wax seals-not completely closed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these way more than the plastic reusable bags I've bought. The zipper is solid, they're easy to turn inside or and wash and they're durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Started to have a bad odor after of use for 2 weeks. Had to toss them out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are easy to wipe clean or I can throw it in the dishwasher or clothes washer. Great sizes as well! We use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and easy to clean. I love the variety of sizes and the zipper!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Reuseable sandwich/snack bags
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with them as I was wanting to get away from disposable plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Broken zippers on arrival
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute, but when it arrives 2 of the zippers were stuck shut and I can't use the bags at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids lunches
customer_reviews.text: Cute and fun for kids lunches then wash in washing machine
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger in size than other snack bags I have purchased! They are thicker and seem to have quality lining inside. Zippers glide easily and my toddler is able to open/close without help. The colors are vibrant. I would purchase additional sets
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sandwiches, apple slices, and anything else that isn't wet and needs containment.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sizes. Easy to clean and open for my 5 year olds lunches.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school lunches
customer_reviews.text: My son loves using these in his lunches! I like the different sizes and the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product to reduce your household waste.
customer_reviews.text: I use a baggy every day to take a sandwich to work with me. This will save lots of baggys for me. Works just fine and I use each multiple times before turining inside out and washing with some other laundry.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for food.
customer_reviews.text: Good for cosmetics or corralling small items in your purse, not for food.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Getting rid of the disposable plastic one bag at a time!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a reusable “ziplock” like snack/lunch bags for awhile now and these are super cute (and affordable). They work very well for sandwiches/snacks on the go without the mess and they come in the cutest prints! Very pleased and will be ordering more in hopes to decrease the amount of disposable plastic in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Cute little bags, the sizes are a bit awkward. I never tried to put foods in the bags that could cause leaking, I did have a sauce in one bag that leaked through. I would make sure the bags are thoroughly dry after washing
customer_reviews.author: PenniMJ

customer_reviews.title: Wipe clean easily
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, I like the size varitey and price. They can easily wipe clean or be washed in the washer. Super cute prints!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Mostly good, but I wish you could mix and match what patterns you want!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and holds everything I need it to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Jilllitt

customer_reviews.title: Multi size, easy to clean, lots of uses!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of multiple sized reusable bags. Easy to clean, just turn them inside out and wipe them down. My husband also likes that this hedgehog print isn’t too little kidish. He takes them to work too.
customer_reviews.author: Krindee Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Not Buying Again
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Will be buying silicone bags in the future. Zipper gets stuck, dries out food.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: convenient sizes, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bags for a couple weeks now in my family's lunches and for snacks on the go. They wrote clean easily and dry quickly when washed. I also love the super cute design. The different sizes they come in are super handy. The large bag is bigger than any other reusable bag I've seen. Really helps cutting back on waste from plastic bags too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mathiesen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good size.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof and soap tastes are persistent even with thorough rinsing. Very cute and good for dry snacks though
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn M.

product_meta.title: Langsprit Premium Reusable Sandwich & Snack Bags-Washable Lunch Bags - Set of 3 - (Hedgehog)
feature_bullets: AN AWESOME LUNCH BAG: Set of 3,Six cute pattern to choose,kids will eagerly dig into anything packed in this adorable snack bags.With this eco-friendly option, your sandwich’s carry case will be just as unique as your taste in food. Each package inside with one large Snack Bag ( 7.8”x 7.8”), one small snack bag ( 7”x 5.5”) and one mini snack bag ( 7”x 3.5”) with the same adorable pattern.

HIGH QUALITY & DURABLE FABRIC: This reusable snack bag is made of sturdy, waterproof PUL fabric with a zipper closure! Keeps more air away from your food, thus keeping it fresher, and it is also much easier to open and close. Fully lined high quality materials, providing reusable snack bag the advantages of long lasting.

EASY TO CLEAN: These reusable sandwich bags are lined with high quality PUL fabric which is waterproof and super easy to wash! Turn them inside out and wipe clean. Or just rinse out/wash out and lay out to dry, couldn't be easier. This reusable snack bags can be cleaned in dishwasher (top rack), hang dry! You can use them again and again!

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: This lunch bags set is suitable for all ages. Great for kinder, school, work or travel. Use bag to hold sandwiches, wraps, home baked goods, whole pieces of fruit and more. Also makes a great gift idea.

SAVE YOUR TIME WHILE SAVING THE EARTH: Use these snack bags as a replacement for all of those plastic bags that you've been carrying around! This is such an easy way to make a positive impact on the world and decreacing the amount of trash you create.
